Trade/Device Name(s): BD BACTEC Peds Plus/F Culture Vials Soybean-Casein Digest Broth with Resins in a Plastic Vial
Specimen Container(s): BD BACTEC Peds Plus/F Culture Vial (Plastic)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD BACTEC Peds Plus/F Culture Vials Soybean-Casein Digest Broth with Resins in a Plastic Vial for aerobic blood culture and detection of microorganisms using BD BACTEC instrument system
Indications for Use Summary: For qualitative culture and recovery of aerobic microorganisms (bacteria and yeast) from pediatric and other blood specimens, typically less than 3 mL, using BD BACTEC fluorescent series instruments.
